Text:
Loads of Great upload

Thanks man

great

Appreciate all feedback, even yours @jezus1234 :) But you dont have to leave same comment under every torrent. Especcially when I have 3-5 torrents upped within 30 min.

See you point about wmv/mp4, and when I have the files first and make torrents for merzedes I often make with wmv + pics only, but then dont make with mp4. 

With my download speeds, making the actual torrent takes more time than getting the files, and it is also quite taxing on my drives when downloading + unrar'ing + making torrents + seeding at the same time trying to get the torrents up as fast as possible for you guys.

So, making 2 torrents would take more time, it would mean duplicate upload of pictures (pics with mp4 and pics with wmv), and it would be more work on harddrives when seeding the files in 2 different torrents. 

I keep EVERYTHING so reseeding either the wmv OR the mp4 later will not be a problem, anyone who needs reseeds may just ask. That goes for mine and Merzedes'.

On most trackers (or all ?) there is the option to choose 'don't download' on one or several files in a torrent. Just use that function to get the files you want, and leave the rest. If ppl use this function instead of downloading both then deleting the mp4 OR wmv then it will not be a problem.

Ill take it into consideration and test to see if it results in overall poorer performance on total seeding.

In the meantime just enjoy the awesome kink porn :)
